EmailTemplate.subject: Build amazing software with AWS, Spring, and Cloud Foundry
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Have you decompressed from re:Invent and digested all the information? We haven’t. But, work goes on and it’s time to put your new knowledge into practice. At Pivotal <[[https://pivotal.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-aws-reinvent-lasvegas-q417]]>, we help the world’s most important companies rethink how they write software, and then offer them the platform to run that software. Thanks to Spring Boot <[[https://pivotal.io/spring-app-framework?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-aws-reinvent-lasvegas-q417]]>, Steeltoe for .NET <[[https://pivotal.io/platform/services-marketplace/microservices-management/steeltoe?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-aws-reinvent-lasvegas-q417]]>, and Pivotal Cloud Foundry (PCF) <[[https://pivotal.io/platform?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-aws-reinvent-lasvegas-q417]]>, you can quickly build modern apps and continuously deploy them to a private or public cloud.
Until we chat again, here are some assets you may find useful as you build software that people love:
- PCF Service Broker for AWS <[[https://pivotal.io/platform/services-marketplace/data-management/aws?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-aws-reinvent-lasvegas-q417]]>. Easily provision, de-provision, and attach to AWS services like RDS, S3, DynamoDB, and SQS. - Whitepaper: Multi-Site Pivotal Cloud Foundry: Deployment Topology Patterns and Practices <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/multi-site-pivotal-cloud-foundry-deployment-topology-patterns-and-practices?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-aws-reinvent-lasvegas-q417]]>. Learn how to take advantage of a multi-cloud architecture. - Whitepaper: Running Microservices on Pivotal Cloud Foundry <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/running-microservices-on-pivotal-cloud-foundry?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-aws-reinvent-lasvegas-q417]]>. Learn about capabilities you should expect in a microservices-friendly platform! - eBook: Migrating to Cloud-Native Application Architectures <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks/migrating-to-cloud-native-application-architectures?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-aws-reinvent-lasvegas-q417]]>. Great look at the cultural and technical challenges of modernizing your practices. - eBook: Data Warehousing with Greenplum: Open Source Massively Parallel Data Analytics <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks/data-warehousing-with-greenplum?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-aws-reinvent-lasvegas-q417]]>. Our OSS data analytics platform is available on AWS, and was featured in our booth. Read all about it.
Thanks for stopping by the booth!
The Pivotal Team
